dc_description_s: This point shapefile represents the locations of the major cities (with populations) of the world at a scale of 1:15,000,000. This layer is part of the 2014 ESRI Data and Maps collection for ArcGIS 10.2. World Cities provides a base map layer of the cities for the world. The cities include national capitals, provincial capitals, major population centers, and landmark cities. ESRI. (2014). World Cities, 1993-2009. ESRI. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/zs998bg8116
